name: Verify Operations Manual Navigation and Content
description: Validates that Operations Manual.b opens correctly, displays 13 pages, and navigation controls work properly.
testObjective: Ensure operations manual provides complete tutorial information with functional page navigation.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Next Steps video has been completed
Operations Manual.b file exists in Temp directory

steps.action: Locate and run Operations Manual.b from Temp directory
steps.expected: Operations Manual opens displaying first page

steps.action: Press [D] key to move to next page
Press [A] key to move to previous page

steps.expected: All pages display correctly with proper content: Operations Manual (1-2), File System (3), Map (4), Camera (5-6), Sending Report (7-10), Moving On (11-12), End text (13)

steps.action: Attempt to press [D] on page 13 (last page)
steps.expected: Manual does not advance beyond page 13
Can navigate backwards through all pages

steps.action: Attempt to press [A] on page 1 (first page)
steps.expected: Manual does not go before page 1
